      â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€        â–€â–€         â–€                 â–€         â–€â–€        â–€â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–€
      
  
      Forestry 2017 This Simulation takes you to the  forest!  Take  over
      the tasks of a professional woodcutter  and enjoy  working  in  the
      woods!  Control huge  machinery (harvester,  trucks,  tractors  and
      crane arms), fell the trees, arrange the timber  and  comb  through
      your wood. Sell the wood, several products and earn money to expand
      your company. The better you maintain the forest and care  for  the
      different tree species, as well as the professional  and timesaving
      use of the  machines, the  more money  will be  available  for  new
      machines and equipment!

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/273800/
